title: 额
author: xu007
txt_content:
我的这个 打开游戏  然后自己就关上了  然后出来一个文本文档  
这是怎么回事啊？？？？？

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
把文本內容貼上來看看

若內容有下列文字, 就是要你更新顯卡驅動...

      Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 那就黏貼上來 不知道代碼我無能為力

replies.txt_content:

百度 “java” 找一個java與您 那就是中文版的官網
